description: Miscellaneous behaviors for various object types and functionalities

aircraft.name: Aircraft
aircraft.description: Creates a controllable aircraft system that supports planes, helicopters, and VTOL vehicles. Features realistic flight physics, weapon systems, and landing mechanics.

properties.name: VEHICLE_TYPE
properties.description: Type of aircraft to create

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the aircraft can be entered

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when aircraft can be entered

properties.name: USE_TEXT1
properties.description: Primary control instructions

properties.name: USE_TEXT2
properties.description: Secondary control instructions

properties.name: LZ_TEXT
properties.default: Landing Zone detected - Press X to commence Auto-landing
properties.description: Text shown when landing zone is detected

properties.name: DISPLAY_X
properties.description: X position of on-screen text

properties.name: DISPLAY_Y
properties.description: Y position of on-screen text

properties.name: PILOT_X
properties.description: X offset of pilot position

properties.name: PILOT_Y
properties.description: Y offset of pilot position

properties.name: PILOT_Z
properties.description: Z offset of pilot position

properties.name: MAX_SPEED
properties.description: Maximum speed of the aircraft

properties.name: VELOCITY
properties.description: Base velocity of the aircraft

properties.name: FX_ANIMATION
properties.description: Animation set to use for effects

properties.name: FX_MODULATION
properties.description: Modulation rate for effects

properties.name: SHOW_READOUTS
properties.description: Whether to show flight information

properties.name: PARTICLE_NO
properties.description: Particle effect to use

properties.name: CAN_BAILOUT
properties.description: Whether player can exit the aircraft mid-flight

properties.name: WEAPON_NAME
properties.description: Weapon to mount on the aircraft

properties.name: WEAPON_AMMO
properties.description: Amount of ammunition for the weapon

properties.name: USE_WEAPON
properties.description: Whether to enable weapon system

properties.name: CROSSHAIR_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to crosshair image file

boat.name: Boat
boat.description: Creates a fully functional boat that can be piloted by the player, featuring realistic water physics, buoyancy, and collision detection. Includes speed control, steering, and automatic water level adjustment.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message displayed when player can enter the boat

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which player can interact with boat

properties.name: MIN_SPEED
properties.description: Minimum speed of the boat

properties.name: MAX_SPEED
properties.description: Maximum speed of the boat

properties.name: TURN_SPEED
properties.description: How quickly the boat can turn

properties.name: DRAG
properties.description: Water resistance affecting boat movement

properties.name: PLAYER_Z_POSITION
properties.description: Forward/back position of player on boat

properties.name: PLAYER_Y_POSITION
properties.description: Height of player on boat

properties.name: BOAT_ROTATION
properties.description: Initial rotation of the boat

properties.name: BOAT_DRAFT
properties.description: How deep the boat sits in water

properties.name: BOAT_POWER
properties.description: Acceleration power of the boat

properties.name: BOAT_BRAKE
properties.description: Braking power of the boat

properties.name: BOAT_BUOYANCY
properties.description: How much the boat bobs in water

features: Multiple sound slots for different effects

steps: Attach the boat behavior to a boat model
Set Physics=ON, Gravity=OFF, IsImobile=YES on the object
Configure boat properties like speed and buoyancy
Add sound effects to Sound0 (Entry/Exit), Sound1 (Moving Loop), Sound2 (Run Aground)
Test controls: E to enter, WASD to move, Q to exit

border_maps.name: Border Maps
border_maps.description: Creates a system for managing map transitions when players reach map boundaries. Supports up to four connected maps with customizable spawn points and transition prompts.

properties.name: NOTIFICATION_TEXT
properties.default: Press E if you wish to leave the area
properties.description: Text shown when player reaches a map border

properties.name: MAP1
properties.description: Name of the map to load when leaving south border

properties.name: MAP2
properties.description: Name of the map to load when leaving north border

properties.name: MAP3
properties.description: Name of the map to load when leaving west border

properties.name: MAP4
properties.description: Name of the map to load when leaving east border

properties.name: BORDER_DISTANCE
properties.description: Distance from map edge to trigger border detection

properties.name: LOAD_TYPE
properties.description: Whether to prompt player before loading next map

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: User global variable for spawn marker system

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME1
properties.description: Spawn marker name for south border transition

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME2
properties.description: Spawn marker name for north border transition

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME3
properties.description: Spawn marker name for west border transition

properties.name: SPAWN_MARKER_NAME4
properties.description: Spawn marker name for east border transition

forcewall.name: Force Wall
forcewall.description: Creates an invisible or visible force field barrier that can block, repel, or damage players. Features multiple force modes, trigger systems, and customizable effects.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when player interacts with the force wall

properties.name: FORCE_MODE
properties.description: Type of force effect to apply

properties.name: STATE
properties.description: Whether the force wall is currently active

properties.name: TRIGGER
properties.description: Trigger system for the force wall

properties.name: VISIBILITY
properties.description: Whether the force wall is visible

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display the prompt text

glue_entity.name: Glue Entity
glue_entity.description: Creates a connection between objects that allows them to move together, with one object acting as the leader. Features automatic position and rotation synchronization, and support for multiple linked objects.

properties.name: BehaviorName
properties.description: Name of the behavior script on the moving entity

steps: Attach the glue_entity behavior to follower
Set behavior name of moving object

hurt_npc.name: Hurt NPC
hurt_npc.description: Creates a system that damages NPCs within range of a specified entity. Features configurable damage amounts, timing intervals, and one-time or continuous damage options.

properties.name: ENTITY_NAME
properties.description: Name of entity that will hurt nearby NPCs

properties.name: HURT_RANGE
properties.description: Range within which NPCs will be damaged

properties.name: HURT_AMOUNT
properties.description: Amount of damage to deal to NPCs

properties.name: HURT_TIME
properties.description: Seconds between damage intervals

properties.name: HurtOnceOnly
properties.description: Whether to damage NPCs only once then disable

steps: Create or select a target object

hud_interface.name: HUD Interface
hud_interface.description: Creates a dynamic interface system that allows objects to display and control custom HUD screens with multiple interactive buttons. Features configurable actions, text prompts, and activation modes including proximity and zone-based triggers.

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which interface can be activated

properties.name: USE_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when player can activate interface

properties.name: HUD_SCREEN
properties.description: Name of HUD screen to display

properties.name: HUD_BUTTON1
properties.description: Text for first button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION1
properties.description: Action for first button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION1_TEXT
properties.description: Feedback text for first button

properties.name: HUD_BUTTON2
properties.description: Text for second button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION2
properties.description: Action for second button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION2_TEXT
properties.description: Feedback text for second button

properties.name: HUD_BUTTON3
properties.description: Text for third button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION3
properties.description: Action for third button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION3_TEXT
properties.description: Feedback text for third button

properties.name: HUD_BUTTON4
properties.description: Text for fourth button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION4
properties.description: Action for fourth button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION4_TEXT
properties.description: Feedback text for fourth button

properties.name: HUD_BUTTON5
properties.description: Text for fifth button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION5
properties.description: Action for fifth button

properties.name: HUD_ACTION5_TEXT
properties.description: Feedback text for fifth button

steps: Create HUD screen with matching button names

life.name: Life
life.description: Creates a collectible extra life object with customizable pickup behavior and display options. Features automatic or manual collection modes, visual highlighting, and logic connections.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when player can collect the life

properties.name: PICKUP_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which life can be collected

properties.name: PICKUP_STYLE
properties.description: Whether life is collected automatically or requires button press

properties.name: COLLECTION_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when life is collected

properties.name: ACTIVATE_LOGIC
properties.description: Whether to trigger logic connections on pickup

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display prompt text

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlight effect for the life object

steps: Create a new object to serve as the life pickup
Test life collection and lives counter

moon.name: Moon
moon.description: Creates a moon object that can rotate and orbit around another object. Features customizable orbital mechanics, player detection, and trigger systems for cutscenes and level transitions.

properties.name: MOON_ADJUST_X
properties.description: X-axis position adjustment

properties.name: MOON_ADJUST_Y
properties.description: Y-axis position adjustment

properties.name: MOON_ADJUST_Z
properties.description: Z-axis position adjustment

properties.name: MOON_ROTATION
properties.description: Speed of moon's rotation

properties.name: ORBIT_PLANET_NAME
properties.description: Name of the object to orbit around

properties.name: ORBIT_DISTANCE
properties.description: Distance from the orbited object

properties.name: ORBIT_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of orbital movement

properties.name: SENSE_RANGE
properties.description: Range at which player detection occurs

properties.name: SENSE_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when player is detected

properties.name: SENSE_TRIGGER
properties.description: Action to take when player is detected

properties.name: VIDEO_SKIP
properties.description: Whether video can be skipped

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: How to handle level transitions

properties.name: ResetStates
properties.description: Whether to reset states when entering new level

navblocker.name: Navigation Blocker
navblocker.description: Creates a navigation mesh blocker for specified objects, preventing AI characters from moving through designated areas. Useful for creating dynamic barriers and restricted zones.

properties.name: OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of the object to create a navigation blocker for

planet.name: Planet
planet.description: Creates a complex planetary system using multiple spherical objects to represent the planet, clouds, atmosphere, and optional rings. Features customizable positioning, scaling, rotation speeds, and proximity-based triggers, with support for video playback and level transitions.

properties.name: PLANET_ADJUST_X
properties.description: X-axis position adjustment for the planet system

properties.name: PLANET_ADJUST_Y
properties.description: Y-axis position adjustment for the planet system

properties.name: PLANET_ADJUST_Z
properties.description: Z-axis position adjustment for the planet system

properties.name: CLOUD_SPHERE
properties.description: Name of the cloud layer sphere object

properties.name: ATMOS_SPHERE
properties.description: Name of the atmosphere sphere object

properties.name: RINGS_CIRCLE
properties.description: Name of the planetary rings object

properties.name: CLOUD_SCALE
properties.description: Additional scale percentage for cloud layer

properties.name: ATMOS_SCALE
properties.description: Additional scale percentage for atmosphere

properties.name: RINGS_SCALE
properties.description: Additional scale percentage for rings

properties.name: PLANET_ROTATION
properties.description: Rotation speed of the planet core

properties.name: CLOUD_ROTATION
properties.description: Rotation speed of the cloud layer

properties.name: RINGS_ROTATION
properties.description: Rotation speed of the planetary rings

properties.name: SENSE_RANGE
properties.description: Range for proximity detection

properties.name: SENSE_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when player enters detection range

properties.name: SENSE_TRIGGER
properties.description: Action to take when player enters range

properties.name: VIDEO_SKIP
properties.description: Whether video can be skipped

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: Controls whether to load the next level in the Storyboard, or a specific level

properties.name: RESETSTATES
properties.description: State reset value when entering the new level

steps: Create cloud sphere with same size
Create atmosphere sphere with same size
Set Physics to ON for all objects
Attach planet behavior to main sphere

scenery.name: Scenery
scenery.description: Allows an object to be used as scenery beyond the game area with customizable positioning and scaling. Perfect for creating background elements and distant objects.

properties.name: SCENERY_SCALE
properties.description: Additional scale percentage to apply to the object

properties.name: POSITION_AJUST_X
properties.description: X-axis position adjustment in world units

properties.name: POSITION_AJUST_Y
properties.description: Y-axis position adjustment in world units

properties.name: POSITION_AJUST_Z
properties.description: Z-axis position adjustment in world units

steps: Set Physics to ON or OFF as needed
Set SCENERY_SCALE if size adjustment needed
Test visibility from intended viewing areas

secret.name: Secret Area
secret.description: Creates a hidden area or secret that can be discovered by players. Features customizable reveal conditions, visual/audio feedback, and progress tracking capabilities.

properties.name: REVEAL_TYPE
properties.description: How the secret is revealed

properties.name: DETECTION_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which secret can be detected

properties.name: REQUIRED_ITEM
properties.description: Item needed to reveal secret (if applicable)

properties.name: HINT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when secret is nearby

properties.name: REVEAL_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when secret is revealed

properties.name: DISPLAY_STYLE
properties.description: How messages are displayed

properties.name: VISUAL_EFFECT
properties.description: Effect when secret is revealed

properties.name: SAVE_PROGRESS
properties.description: Whether to save discovery state

properties.name: SECRET_ID
properties.description: Unique identifier for progress tracking

properties.name: HINT_FREQUENCY
properties.description: Seconds between hint messages (0=off)

shrink.name: Shrink
shrink.description: Creates a dynamic shrinking effect that can reduce the size of objects along specified axes. Features smooth scaling transitions, range-based activation, and collision handling.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when shrinking is activated

properties.name: ACTIVATION_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which shrinking is triggered

properties.name: SHRINK_MODE
properties.description: Which axes to apply shrinking to

properties.name: SHRINK_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of the shrinking effect

properties.name: SHRINK_SCALE
properties.description: Final scale percentage of the object

sound_object.name: Sound Object
sound_object.description: Creates an interactive sound emitter that plays a sound when activated by the player. Features customizable prompts, range-based activation, and logic connection support.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when player can activate the sound

properties.name: USE_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which player can activate the sound

properties.name: ACTIVATED_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when sound is activated

properties.name: PROMPT_DISPLAY
properties.description: Where to display prompt messages

properties.name: ITEM_HIGHLIGHT
properties.description: Visual highlight style for the object

properties.name: ACTIVATE_LOGIC
properties.description: Whether to trigger logic connections when activated

properties.name: SINGLE_USE
properties.description: Whether the object becomes inactive after one use

steps: Set up logic connections if needed

speeder.name: Speeder
speeder.description: Creates a mountable speeder vehicle that can be driven by the player. Features WASD controls, physics-based movement, collision detection, and customizable player positioning.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when player can enter the speeder

properties.name: ENTER_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which player can enter the speeder

properties.name: ENTER_ANGLE
properties.description: Angle range for entering the speeder

properties.name: PLAYER_XZ_ADJUSTMENT
properties.description: Forward/back position offset of player on speeder

properties.name: PLAYER_Y_ADJUSTMENT
properties.description: Height offset of player on speeder

properties.name: PLAYER_ANGLE_ADJUSTMENT
properties.description: Rotation offset of player on speeder

properties.name: MAXIMUM_SPEED
properties.description: Maximum forward speed of the speeder

properties.name: MINIMUM_SPEED
properties.description: Maximum reverse speed of the speeder

properties.name: TURN_SPEED
properties.description: How quickly the speeder can turn

properties.name: ACCELERATION
properties.description: How quickly the speeder gains speed

properties.name: DECCELERATION
properties.description: How quickly the speeder loses speed

properties.name: IMPACT_RANGE
properties.description: Range for collision detection

properties.name: IMPACT_ANGLE
properties.description: Angle range for collision detection

properties.name: SPEEDER_HEALTH
properties.description: Health points of the speeder

properties.name: MAXIMUM_SLOPE
properties.description: Maximum slope angle the speeder can climb

properties.name: USE_TEXT
properties.description: Control instructions shown to player

properties.name: LOCK_PLAYER
properties.description: Whether to lock player rotation to speeder

navblocker.name: Navblocker
navblocker.description: Creates navigation mesh blockers for named objects in the game. Automatically calculates collision boundaries and prevents AI pathfinding through specified objects. Objects must be set to dynamic physics for proper functionality.

properties.name: OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of the object to create a navmesh blocker for. Must match the exact name of the target object in the scene.

features: Automatic navmesh blocking for named objects
Prevents AI pathfinding through blocked areas
No manual configuration required after setup

steps: Create the object you want to block navigation for
Set the object's Physics to ON
Set the object's IsImmobile to ON
Note the exact name of the object
Set OBJECT_NAME to match your target object
Test AI pathfinding around the blocked object

vendor.name: Vendor
vendor.description: Creates a vending machine system that dispenses items to players. Features cost-based purchasing, quantity limits, item lifespan management, and multiple empty-state behaviors. Perfect for creating shops, item dispensers, and commerce systems.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when player can interact with the vendor

properties.name: PROMPT_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the player can interact with the vendor

properties.name: NOISE_RANGE
properties.description: Range at which AI can hear the vendor being used

properties.name: VENDOR_ANIMATION
properties.description: Animation to play when vendor is activated

properties.name: VENDORED_MAX_QUANTITY
properties.description: Maximum number of items the vendor can dispense

properties.name: VENDORED_ENTITY_COST
properties.description: Cost of each item in the specified currency

properties.name: VENDORED_ENTITY_LIFESPAN
properties.description: Lifespan of dispensed items in minutes (0 = Eternal)

properties.name: VENDORED_ENTITY_NAME
properties.description: Name of the entity to dispense (must exist in scene)

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL_AFFECTED
properties.description: Name of the user global variable for payment (e.g., MyMoney)

properties.name: WHEN_EMPTY
properties.description: Action to perform when vendor runs out of items

properties.name: VENDING_DELAY
properties.description: Delay in seconds before item is dispensed

properties.name: VENDING_FORCE
properties.description: Force applied to dispensed items in the vendor's facing direction

features: Item lifespan management with eternal option
Sound effects for activation, vending, and empty states

steps: Create the item entity you want to vend
Set AlwaysActive to ON, IsImmobile to YES
Set VENDORED_ENTITY_NAME to match your item
